name: Blaster Silonga
description: '''Blaster Mitchell Medina Silonga''' (born September 30, 1999) is a Filipino singer-songwriter, musician and producer. He is best known as the co-vocalist and the lead guitarist of the funk rock band [[IV of Spades]]. He also pursued a solo career and formed his own band known as "Blaster and the Celestial Klowns" when the band went on an indefinite hiatus in 2020, which he released his first studio album ''My Kosmik Island Disk'' in 2022. He released his second and latest studio album ''Last Fool Show'' in 2025.
